content:
i found this baby bonnet in an online book scanned and published by google this is the same source as used for the wine rubber doilies calls for boar s head cotton no 30 for the cap no 40 for the edging and a fine crochet needle modern equivalents are unknown
direct pdf link should open in browser to the engraving on page xxiii 1 direct pdf link to page 1 2 1 http //books google com/books id=i3gdaaaaqaaj&printsec=toc&source=gbs_summary_r&cad=0#ppr23 m1 2 http //books google com/books id=i3gdaaaaqaaj&printsec=toc&source=gbs_summary_r&cad=0#ppa1 m1
